class.name: LinearSolverCholBlock64

javadoc.text: A wrapper around {@link org.ejml.factory.CholeskyDecomposition}(BlockMatrix64F) that allows * it to be easily used with {@link org.ejml.data.DenseMatrix64F}.
javadoc.author: Peter Abeles

javadoc.text: Only converts the B matrix and passes that onto solve. Te result is then copied into * the input 'X' matrix.
javadoc.param: B A matrix ℜ <sup>m × p</sup>. Not modified.
X A matrix ℜ <sup>n × p</sup>, where the solution is written to. Modified.

method.name: solve
method.comment: since overwrite B is true X does not need to be passed in
